text: "A Good Heart" is a 1985 song by Northern Irish singer Feargal Sharkey. It is the first single from his first studio album Feargal Sharkey. The song went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Australia, Ireland, the Netherlands and Belgium, number 74 in the United States, number 3 in New Zealand, South Africa and Switzerland and number 4 in Germany and Canada. ==Formats== ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Feargal Sharkey songs
title: A Good Heart
